hasAttributes.name: adjustmentAmount
hasAttributes.description:
Reference number on shipping document
(company reference or logistics company
identifier).

hasAttributes.name: adjustmentDescription
hasAttributes.description:
If an adjustment to the receipt, a description
of the reason for the adjustment.

hasAttributes.name: adjustmentIndicator
hasAttributes.description:
"0" if the transaction is the original shipment
transaction, "1" if the transaction is a
shipment adjustment.

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: User ID (from User_Listing file) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedDate
hasAttributes.description: Date the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, and so on at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: customerAccountId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the customer from whom payment is expected or to whom unused credits have been applied.

hasAttributes.name: enteredBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: enteredDate
hasAttributes.description:
Date the order was entered into the system.
This is sometimes referred to as the creation
date. This should be a system-generated
date (rather than user-entered date), when
possible. This date does not necessarily
correspond with the date of the transaction
itself.

hasAttributes.name: goodsReceivedAmount
hasAttributes.description:
Customer purchasing the product. Must
 match a Customer_Account_ID in the
 Customer_Master_Listing_YYYYMMDD file.

hasAttributes.name: goodsReceivedExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the entry was last modified before posting.

hasAttributes.name: lineAmount
hasAttributes.description: In the header's default currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderAmount
hasAttributes.description: In the header's default currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderLineAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description:
Monetary amount for the line item in the
sales order related to the shipping document
line item. Recorded in the local currency. If
 no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderLineId
hasAttributes.description:
Identifier for sales order line number.
Must match Sales_Order_Line_ID used
in
Sales_Orders_Lines_YYYYMMDD_YY
YYMMDD file. If no sales order, leave
blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description:
The currency for local reporting 
requirements. See ISO 4217 coding. If no
sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderQuantity
hasAttributes.description:
Sales order line original quantity. If no sales
 order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderUnitOfMeasure
hasAttributes.description:
Sales order line base unit of measure. If no
 sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderUnitPrice
hasAttributes.description:
Sales order line price per unit. If no sales 
order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineShipmentId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each shipment. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (for example, document number, document type, and year) to uniquely identify each shipment. Must match the Shipment_ID field in the file Shipments_Made_YYYYMMDD_YYYYMMDD.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingDocumentLineId
hasAttributes.description: Reference line number on shipping document.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingLineAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description:
Monetary amount for the line item in the
shipping document related to the sales order.
Recorded in the local currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingLineAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description:
The currency for local reporting
requirements. See ISO 4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductBarCode
hasAttributes.description: UPC or other general identifier.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductCode
hasAttributes.description: Product code appearing on the trade document

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductDescription
hasAttributes.description: Product description (plain English) to indicate the name or other identifying characteristics of the product.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductGroup01
hasAttributes.description: Product descriptor #1, for example, tires or accessories.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductGroup02
hasAttributes.description: Product descriptor #2, for example, brand.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier that is unique for each product.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingQuantity
hasAttributes.description: Item quantity sent.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingUnitOfMeasure
hasAttributes.description: Base unit of measure.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingUnitPrice
hasAttributes.description: Price per unit for item sent.

hasAttributes.name: postingStatus
hasAttributes.description:
Status of the transaction's posting to the GL
(for example, "Posted," "Not Posted").

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderAmount
hasAttributes.description: In the header's default currency.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Sales monetary amount recorded in the local currency.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderDate
hasAttributes.description:
Date of sales order for items shipped. If no
sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderId
hasAttributes.description:
Sales order ID for invoiced items.  Must
match Sales_Order_ID in the
Sales_Orders_YYYYMMDD_YYYYMMDD
file. If no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: The currency for local reporting requirements. See ISO 4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description:
Reserved segment field that can be used for 
profit center, division, fund, program,
branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description:
Reserved segment field that can be used for 
profit center, division, fund, program,
branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description:
Reserved segment field that can be used for 
profit center, division, fund, program,
branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description:
Reserved segment field that can be used for 
profit center, division, fund, program,
branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description:
Reserved segment field that can be used for 
profit center, division, fund, program,
branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: shipmentDate
hasAttributes.description: Date of shipment (date shipped)

hasAttributes.name: shipmentFiscalYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which the Shipment_Date occurs���YYYY for delimited, CCYY-MM-DD fiscal year end (ISO 8601) for extensible business reporting language global ledger taxonomy framework (XBRL GL).

hasAttributes.name: shipmentId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each shipment. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (for example, document number, document type, and year) to uniquely identify each shipment.

hasAttributes.name: shipmentPeriod
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the Shapment_Date occurs. Examples include W1���W53 for weekly periods, M1���M12 for monthly periods, and Q1���Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: shippingAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description:
Monetary amount for the items in the
shipping document related to the sales order.
Recorded in the local currency.

hasAttributes.name: shippingAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description:
The currency for local reporting
requirements. See ISO 4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: shippingDocumentId
hasAttributes.description:
Reference number on shipping document
(company reference or logistics company
identifier).
